attributes.action: bring in a mandatory sentence of life should mean life for murder
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: whilst a murderer gets to spend 10 years in prison for killing someone then released to start fresh what about the person whos life has been ended. its about time the sentence means what it says life should be for life

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
